00058 /* Brush operators */
00059 static int brush_add_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00060 {
00061     /*int type = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "type");*/
00062     Paint *paint = paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C));
00063     struct Brush *br = paint_brush(paint);
00064 
00065     if (br)
00066         br = copy_brush(br);
00067     else
00068         br = add_brush("Brush");
00069 
00070     paint_brush_set(paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C)), br);
00071 
00072     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00073 }
00074 
00075 static void BRUSH_OT_add(wmOperatorType *ot)
00076 {
00077     /* identifiers */
00078     ot->name = "Add Brush";
00079     ot->description = "Add brush by mode type";
00080     ot->idname = "BRUSH_OT_add";
00081     
00082     /* api callbacks */
00083     ot->exec = brush_add_exec;
00084     
00085     /* flags */
00086     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00087 }

00089 
00090 static int brush_scale_size_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00091 {
00092     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00093     Paint  *paint =  paint_get_active(scene);
00094     struct Brush  *brush =  paint_brush(paint);
00095     // Object *ob=     CTX_data_active_object(C);
00096     float scalar = RNA_float_get(op->ptr, "scalar");
00097 
00098     if (brush) {
00099         // pixel radius
00100         {
00101             const int old_size = brush_size(scene, brush);
00102             int size = (int)(scalar * old_size);
00103 
00104             if (old_size == size) {
00105                 if (scalar > 1) {
00106                     size++;
00107                 }
00108                 else if (scalar < 1) {
00109                     size--;
00110                 }
00111             }
00112             CLAMP(size, 1, 2000); // XXX magic number
00113 
00114             brush_set_size(scene, brush, size);
00115         }
00116 
00117         // unprojected radius
00118         {
00119             float unprojected_radius = scalar * brush_unprojected_radius(scene, brush);
00120 
00121             if (unprojected_radius < 0.001f) // XXX magic number
00122                 unprojected_radius = 0.001f;
00123 
00124             brush_set_unprojected_radius(scene, brush, unprojected_radius);
00125         }
00126     }
00127 
00128     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00129 }
00130 
00131 static void BRUSH_OT_scale_size(wmOperatorType *ot)
00132 {
00133     /* identifiers */
00134     ot->name = "Scale Sculpt/Paint Brush Size";
00135     ot->description = "Change brush size by a scalar";
00136     ot->idname = "BRUSH_OT_scale_size";
00137     
00138     /* api callbacks */
00139     ot->exec = brush_scale_size_exec;
00140     
00141     /* flags */
00142     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00143 
00144     RNA_def_float(ot->srna, "scalar", 1, 0, 2, "Scalar", "Factor to scale brush size by", 0, 2);
00145 }

00147 static int vertex_color_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00148 {
00149     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00150     Object *obact = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00151     unsigned int paintcol = vpaint_get_current_col(scene->toolsettings->vpaint);
00152     vpaint_fill(obact, paintcol);
00153     
00154     ED_region_tag_redraw(CTX_wm_region(C)); // XXX - should redraw all 3D views
00155     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00156 }

00172 static int brush_reset_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *UNUSED(op))
00173 {
00174     Paint *paint = paint_get_active(CTX_data_scene(C));
00175     struct Brush *brush = paint_brush(paint);
00176     Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00177 
00178     if (!ob) return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00179 
00180     if (ob->mode & OB_MODE_SCULPT)
00181         brush_reset_sculpt(brush);
00182     /* TODO: other modes */
00183 
00184     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00185 }

00192     ot->idname = "BRUSH_OT_reset";

00200 
00201 static int brush_tool(const Brush *brush, size_t tool_offset)
00202 {
00203     return *(((char *)brush) + tool_offset);
00204 }
00205 
00206 /* generic functions for setting the active brush based on the tool */
00207 static Brush *brush_tool_cycle(Main *bmain, Brush *brush_orig, const int tool, const size_t tool_offset, const int ob_mode)
00208 {
00209     struct Brush *brush;
00210 
00211     if (!brush_orig && !(brush_orig = bmain->brush.first)) {
00212         return NULL;
00213     }
00214 
00215     /* get the next brush with the active tool */
00216     for (brush = brush_orig->id.next ? brush_orig->id.next : bmain->brush.first;
00217          brush != brush_orig;
00218          brush = brush->id.next ? brush->id.next : bmain->brush.first)
00219     {
00220         if ((brush->ob_mode & ob_mode) &&
00221             (brush_tool(brush, tool_offset) == tool)) {
00222             return brush;
00223         }
00224     }
00225 
00226     return NULL;
00227 }
00228 
00229 static int brush_generic_tool_set(Main *bmain, Paint *paint, const int tool, const size_t tool_offset, const int ob_mode)
00230 {
00231     struct Brush *brush, *brush_orig = paint_brush(paint);
00232 
00233     brush = brush_tool_cycle(bmain, brush_orig, tool, tool_offset, ob_mode);
00234 
00235     if (brush) {
00236         paint_brush_set(paint, brush);
00237         WM_main_add_notifier(NC_BRUSH | NA_EDITED, brush);
00238         return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00239     }
00240     else {
00241         return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00242     }
00243 }
00244 
00245 /* used in the PAINT_OT_brush_select operator */
00246 #define OB_MODE_ACTIVE 0
00247 
00248 static int brush_select_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00249 {
00250     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
00251     ToolSettings *toolsettings = CTX_data_tool_settings(C);
00252     Paint *paint = NULL;
00253     int tool, paint_mode = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "paint_mode");
00254     size_t tool_offset;
00255 
00256     if (paint_mode == OB_MODE_ACTIVE) {
00257         Object *ob = CTX_data_active_object(C);
00258         if (ob) {
00259             /* select current paint mode */
00260             paint_mode = ob->mode &
00261                          (OB_MODE_SCULPT |
00262                           OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT |
00263                           OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT |
00264                           OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT);
00265         }
00266         else {
00267             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00268         }
00269     }
00270 
00271     switch (paint_mode) {
00272         case OB_MODE_SCULPT:
00273             paint = &toolsettings->sculpt->paint;
00274             tool_offset = offsetof(Brush, sculpt_tool);
00275             tool = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "sculpt_tool");
00276             break;
00277         case OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT:
00278             paint = &toolsettings->vpaint->paint;
00279             tool_offset = offsetof(Brush, vertexpaint_tool);
00280             tool = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "vertex_paint_tool");
00281             break;
00282         case OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT:
00283             paint = &toolsettings->wpaint->paint;
00284             /* vertexpaint_tool is used for weight paint mode */
00285             tool_offset = offsetof(Brush, vertexpaint_tool);
00286             tool = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "weight_paint_tool");
00287             break;
00288         case OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT:
00289             paint = &toolsettings->imapaint.paint;
00290             tool_offset = offsetof(Brush, imagepaint_tool);
00291             tool = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "texture_paint_tool");
00292             break;
00293         default:
00294             /* invalid paint mode */
00295             return OPERATOR_CANCELLED;
00296     }
00297 
00298     return brush_generic_tool_set(bmain, paint, tool, tool_offset, paint_mode);
00299 }
00300 
00301 static void PAINT_OT_brush_select(wmOperatorType *ot)
00302 {
00303     static EnumPropertyItem paint_mode_items[] = {
00304         {OB_MODE_ACTIVE, "ACTIVE", 0, "Current", "Set brush for active paint mode"},
00305         {OB_MODE_SCULPT, "SCULPT", ICON_SCULPTMODE_HLT, "Sculpt", ""},
00306         {OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT, "VERTEX_PAINT", ICON_VPAINT_HLT, "Vertex Paint", ""},
00307         {OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT, "WEIGHT_PAINT", ICON_WPAINT_HLT, "Weight Paint", ""},
00308         {OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT, "TEXTURE_PAINT", ICON_TPAINT_HLT, "Texture Paint", ""},
00309         {0, NULL, 0, NULL, NULL}
00310     };
00311 
00312     /* identifiers */
00313     ot->name = "Brush Select";
00314     ot->description = "Select a paint mode's brush by tool type";
00315     ot->idname = "PAINT_OT_brush_select";
00316 
00317     /* api callbacks */
00318     ot->exec = brush_select_exec;
00319 
00320     /* flags */
00321     ot->flag = OPTYPE_REGISTER | OPTYPE_UNDO;
00322 
00323     /* props */
00324     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "paint_mode", paint_mode_items, OB_MODE_ACTIVE, "Paint Mode", "");
00325     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "sculpt_tool", brush_sculpt_tool_items, 0, "Sculpt Tool", "");
00326     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "vertex_paint_tool", brush_vertex_tool_items, 0, "Vertex Paint Tool", "");
00327     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "weight_paint_tool", brush_vertex_tool_items, 0, "Weight Paint Tool", "");
00328     RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "texture_paint_tool", brush_image_tool_items, 0, "Texture Paint Tool", "");
00329 }
00330 
00331 static wmKeyMapItem *keymap_brush_select(wmKeyMap *keymap, int paint_mode,
00332                                          int tool, int keymap_type,
00333                                          int keymap_modifier)
00334 {
00335     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00336     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "PAINT_OT_brush_select",
00337                              keymap_type, KM_PRESS, keymap_modifier, 0);
00338 
00339     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "paint_mode", paint_mode);
00340     
00341     switch (paint_mode) {
00342         case OB_MODE_SCULPT:
00343             RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "sculpt_tool", tool);
00344             break;
00345         case OB_MODE_VERTEX_PAINT:
00346             RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "vertex_paint_tool", tool);
00347             break;
00348         case OB_MODE_WEIGHT_PAINT:
00349             RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "weight_paint_tool", tool);
00350             break;
00351         case OB_MODE_TEXTURE_PAINT:
00352             RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "texture_paint_tool", tool);
00353             break;
00354     }
00355 
00356     return kmi;
00357 }

00359 static int brush_uv_sculpt_tool_set_exec(bContext *C, wmOperator *op)
00360 {
00361     Brush *brush;
00362     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00363     ToolSettings *ts = scene->toolsettings;
00364     ts->uv_sculpt_tool = RNA_enum_get(op->ptr, "tool");
00365     brush = ts->uvsculpt->paint.brush;
00366     /* To update toolshelf */
00367     WM_event_add_notifier(C, NC_BRUSH | NA_EDITED, brush);
00368 
00369     return OPERATOR_FINISHED;
00370 }

00379     ot->idname = "BRUSH_OT_uv_sculpt_tool_set";
00380

00382     ot->exec = brush_uv_sculpt_tool_set_exec;

00384 
00385     /* flags */
00386     ot->flag = 0;
00387 
00388     /* props */
00389     ot->prop = RNA_def_enum(ot->srna, "tool", uv_sculpt_tool_items, 0, "Tool", "");

00394 void ED_operatortypes_paint(void)
00395 {
00396     /* brush */
00397     WM_operatortype_append(BRUSH_OT_add);
00398     WM_operatortype_append(BRUSH_OT_scale_size);
00399     WM_operatortype_append(BRUSH_OT_curve_preset);
00400     WM_operatortype_append(BRUSH_OT_reset);
00401 
00402     /* note, particle uses a different system, can be added with existing operators in wm.py */
00403     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_brush_select);
00404     WM_operatortype_append(BRUSH_OT_uv_sculpt_tool_set);
00405 
00406     /* image */
00407     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_texture_paint_toggle);
00408     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_image_paint);
00409     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_sample_color);
00410     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_grab_clone);
00411     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_clone_cursor_set);
00412     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_project_image);
00413     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_image_from_view);
00414 
00415     /* weight */
00416     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_paint_toggle);
00417     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_paint);
00418     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_set);
00419     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_from_bones);
00420     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_sample);
00421     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_weight_sample_group);
00422 
00423     /* uv */
00424     WM_operatortype_append(SCULPT_OT_uv_sculpt_stroke);
00425 
00426     /* vertex selection */
00427     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_vert_select_all);
00428     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_vert_select_inverse);
00429 
00430     /* vertex */
00431     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_vertex_paint_toggle);
00432     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_vertex_paint);
00433     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_vertex_color_set);
00434 
00435     /* face-select */
00436     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_linked);
00437     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_linked_pick);
00438     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_all);
00439     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_inverse);
00440     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_hide);
00441     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_face_select_reveal);
00442 
00443     /* partial visibility */
00444     WM_operatortype_append(PAINT_OT_hide_show);
00445 }

00448 static void ed_keymap_paint_brush_switch(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *mode)
00449 {
00450     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00451     int i;
00452     /* index 0-9 (zero key is tenth), shift key for index 10-19 */
00453     for (i = 0; i < 20; i++) {
00454         kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "BRUSH_OT_active_index_set",
00455                                  ZEROKEY + ((i + 1) % 10), KM_PRESS, i < 10 ? 0 : KM_SHIFT, 0);
00456         RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "mode", mode);
00457         RNA_int_set(kmi->ptr, "index", i);
00458     }
00459 }

00461 static void ed_keymap_paint_brush_size(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *UNUSED(path))
00462 {
00463     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00464 
00465     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "BRUSH_OT_scale_size", LEFTBRACKETKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00466     RNA_float_set(kmi->ptr, "scalar", 0.9);
00467 
00468     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "BRUSH_OT_scale_size", RIGHTBRACKETKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00469     RNA_float_set(kmi->ptr, "scalar", 10.0 / 9.0); // 1.1111....
00470 }
00471 
00472 typedef enum {
00473     RC_COLOR = 1,
00474     RC_ROTATION = 2,
00475     RC_ZOOM = 4,
00476 } RCFlags;
00477 
00478 static void set_brush_rc_path(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *brush_path,
00479                               const char *output_name, const char *input_name)
00480 {
00481     char *path;
00482 
00483     path = BLI_sprintfN("%s.%s", brush_path, input_name);
00484     RNA_string_set(ptr, output_name, path);
00485     MEM_freeN(path);
00486 }
00487 
00488 static void set_brush_rc_props(PointerRNA *ptr, const char *paint,
00489                                const char *prop, const char *secondary_prop,
00490                                RCFlags flags)
00491 {
00492     const char *ups_path = "tool_settings.unified_paint_settings";
00493     char *brush_path;
00494 
00495     brush_path = BLI_sprintfN("tool_settings.%s.brush", paint);
00496 
00497     set_brush_rc_path(ptr, brush_path, "data_path_primary", prop);
00498     if (secondary_prop) {
00499         set_brush_rc_path(ptr, ups_path, "use_secondary", secondary_prop);
00500         set_brush_rc_path(ptr, ups_path, "data_path_secondary", prop);
00501     }
00502     else {
00503         RNA_string_set(ptr, "use_secondary", "");
00504         RNA_string_set(ptr, "data_path_secondary", "");
00505     }
00506     set_brush_rc_path(ptr, brush_path, "color_path", "cursor_color_add");
00507     set_brush_rc_path(ptr, brush_path, "rotation_path", "texture_slot.angle");
00508     RNA_string_set(ptr, "image_id", brush_path);
00509 
00510     if (flags & RC_COLOR)
00511         set_brush_rc_path(ptr, brush_path, "fill_color_path", "color");
00512     else
00513         RNA_string_set(ptr, "fill_color_path", "");
00514     if (flags & RC_ZOOM)
00515         RNA_string_set(ptr, "zoom_path", "space_data.zoom");
00516     else
00517         RNA_string_set(ptr, "zoom_path", "");
00518 
00519     MEM_freeN(brush_path);
00520 }
00521 
00522 static void ed_keymap_paint_brush_radial_control(wmKeyMap *keymap, const char *paint,
00523                                                  RCFlags flags)
00524 {
00525     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00526 
00527     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_radial_control", FKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00528     set_brush_rc_props(kmi->ptr, paint, "size", "use_unified_size", flags);
00529 
00530     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_radial_control", FKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00531     set_brush_rc_props(kmi->ptr, paint, "strength", "use_unified_strength", flags);
00532 
00533     if (flags & RC_ROTATION) {
00534         kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_radial_control", FKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00535         set_brush_rc_props(kmi->ptr, paint, "texture_slot.angle", NULL, flags);
00536     }
00537 }

00539 void paint_partial_visibility_keys(wmKeyMap *keymap)
00540 {
00541     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00542     
00543     /* Partial visiblity */
00544     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "PAINT_OT_hide_show", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00545     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", PARTIALVIS_SHOW);
00546     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "area", PARTIALVIS_INSIDE);
00547     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "PAINT_OT_hide_show", HKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00548     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", PARTIALVIS_HIDE);
00549     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "area", PARTIALVIS_INSIDE);
00550     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "PAINT_OT_hide_show", HKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00551     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "action", PARTIALVIS_SHOW);
00552     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "area", PARTIALVIS_ALL);
00553 }
00554 
00555 void ED_keymap_paint(wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00556 {
00557     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00558     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00559     int i;
00560     
00561     /* Sculpt mode */
